meta_title: CMMS vs EAM Comparison: The Strategic Maturity Model (2026 Guide)
meta_description: Don't just compare features. Use our Strategic Maturity Model to decide between CMMS vs EAM based on asset complexity, TCO, and ISO 55000 goals.
title: CMMS vs EAM Comparison: A Strategic Maturity Framework for Decision Makers

hero_image.alt: Hero image for CMMS vs EAM Comparison: A Strategic Maturity Framework for Decision Makers

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern, high-tech manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of three professionals (a maintenance manager in a white hard hat, a reliability engineer holding a tablet showing complex data graphs, and a technician in safety gear) are standing near a large, complex industrial turbine. They are in discussion, looking at the machinery, not the camera. The lighting is industrial but warm, highlighting the clean, organized nature of the facility. The background shows blurred automated conveyor systems and digital dashboard displays on the walls, symbolizing Industry 4.0. No text or logos visible. High resolution, 16:9 aspect ratio.
